summary: Just several simple bat files i made in my spare time,they give player some items,increase their skills etc in the way players choose but they dont make players invincible just give them some benefits
descriptionHtml:
First please forgive my abominable English 

Well after downloading countless mods from Nexus i thought i should do something in return and i made this bat files,these are just simple txt files that you can use while making your ultimate character,
there are 5 options:

w1:Warrior start that gives you some perks,increase your needed(imo) warrior skills for good start,gives you armor,weapon,gold,
w2:This is a little bit boosted version of w1

m1:Balanced mage start will increase your needed(again imo) mage skills for good start,gives you robe,hood,spell tomes,gold

s1:This file is for the ones want to make their character stealthy assassin/thief type,it gives you picks,gold,armor,weapon and of course increase needed(again and again imo) skills for good start

s2:A little bit boosted version of s1

INSTALLATION

Place the desired .txt file in your Skyrim directory.
Then, simply start up the game, 
open up the console using the ~ key, and type, ex: \"bat w1\".

Well that\'s it,thanks :)

Apology:I am so sorry to make 2 updates for this... this simple txt files but its the first time i uploaded something so please forgive me.
author: nonsense16
